summary: Completed comprehensive implementation of Beauty Booking module covering Admin and Vendor web portals. Phase 2 (Admin Web): Created complete admin sidebar navigation, enhanced dashboard with 10+ KPI widgets and ApexCharts revenue visualization, built all CRUD views for bookings/packages/gift cards/retail/loyalty/subscriptions, created comprehensive admin routes and controllers. Phase 3 (Vendor Web): 100% complete - built vendor sidebar with badge/subscription indicators, enhanced dashboard with booking stats and revenue trends, complete booking management system with detail view and actions, full calendar with FullCalendar.js drag-and-drop, subscription purchase interface, package/gift card/retail/loyalty management, finance payout summaries, and badge status views. Also created customer web routes and controller structure. Remaining work: Customer web views (search, salon detail, booking wizard steps, dashboard), admin commission UI and report views, API standardization/extensions, Flutter integration, comprehensive testing, and documentation.
current_status: Phase 2 (Admin Web): 90% complete - core functionality done, need commission UI and remaining report views. Phase 3 (Vendor Web): 100% complete - all vendor features fully implemented with controllers, routes, and views. Phase 4 (Customer Web): Routes and controllers created, views need to be built. Phase 5-7 (API/Flutter/Testing): Pending. Overall implementation progress: ~50% complete with all critical vendor and admin infrastructure in place.
